snippet: We're on vacation until April 16, but we've provided a live feed of two red-tailed hawks watching over eggs that may hatch at any moment and teaching ideas for spring-related topics.
abstract: We're on vacation until April 16, but we've provided a live feed of two red-tailed hawks watching over eggs that may hatch at any moment and teaching ideas for spring-related topics.

headline.main: We're on Spring Break, but While We're Gone ...
